12:42 <webczat> has joined #xwiki  
12:42 <webczat> Hello, can you tell me who has the right to make and modify blog posts in the blog app?  
12:43 <sdumitriu> webczat: By default, any registered user  
12:43 <webczat> What permissions are used to change it? edit?  
12:44 <sdumitriu> Yes  
12:45 <webczat> mhmm, what about creating new blogs for projects etc? possible?  
12:45 <sdumitriu> Yes  
12:47 <sdumitriu> xwiki/bin/Blog/Management  
12:47 <webczat> how?  
12:49 <webczat> the same for bulletin board  
12:53 <webczat> I only see a blog and nothing more, I'm not sure how to create a second blog or something  
12:53 <sdumitriu> xwiki/bin/Blog/Management  
12:54 <sdumitriu> That's how you create a new blog  
12:56 <webczat> How do you get there normally if you don't know/forget the link?  
12:56 <sdumitriu> It's hard...  
12:57 <sdumitriu> It should be changed into an administration section  
12:59 <webczat> can you create bulletin boards with the bulletin board application too?  
13:02 <webczat> also can you delete the main blog?  
13:08 <sdumitriu> The BB application should be configurable from the wiki administration  
13:12 <sdumitriu> You shouldn't delete the main blog, that is a kind of aggregator listing entries from the entire wiki  
13:16 <webczat> mm  
13:16 <webczat> actually bb is not configurable from admin, just from itself  
13:20 <webczat> is it possible to block an user or IP address? I think it would be useful.  
13:21 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:22 <webczat> like somehow protect the wiki from the user mass-editing pages. I can revoke permissions but the user can still register another account etc
